page.title: 15WELLINGTON HEATH CLUBS CONT.
page.content: Existing activities consist of a{Play {Group}of 20 which meets twice weekly, and a{Mums and Toddlers}group meeting on Weds. On Tues. the new{Youth Club meets, offering adventure holidays, water courses,competitions, darts and snooker etc. The local{Brownie pack meets on Monday nights, a{rock band plays twice weekly and there are weekly{Keep Fit}classes.The{Horti- {cultural Soc,}with 58 members, meets once a month, a{whist drive}is held twice a month, and a{Country and {Western concert}four times a year. The Village Committee of the{Save the {Children Fund}meet twice a year,the {Order of the Moose}meet yearly and special annual events such as{"Those {were the Days",}the{Spring Fayre}and visits from the Midlands Arts Group {"Pentabus"}ensure a busy and active Memorial Hall.
